title: When will Spectate be back up?
body: Also, when will the error on loading screens and failing to connect get fixed. Feels like it happens every game.

replies.body: Currently you'll see all players as "Not Connected" when loading into a game you want to spectate. However despite showing "Not Connected" on the loading screen, the game you're trying to spectate is actually being loaded in the background and will jump into game when it's done loading.
When I select the Spectate option nothing happens. It doesn't bring up any screen or anything, it's basically like clicking a button that does nothing.
> I am having the same issue :(
